messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR DR PHILLIP LEE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Phillip wants sustainable jobs for local people and good public transportation services to support them.
Phillip supports community-based healthcare and believes our pensioners should be treated with dignity and respect.
Phillip is a committed patriot and wants our British Armed Forces to be properly supported.

issues.socialWelfare: believes our pensioners should be treated with dignity and respect

contactInformation.address: 10 Milbanke Court, Milbanke Way, Bracknell RG12 1RP

endorsements.endorsement: We can’t go on like this. We need change. Vote for change.

quotes.text: We can’t go on like this. We need change.

images.caption: Dr Phillip Lee and his team called to see you today
